name: Uncle Lu Restaurant安可盧 萬巒豬腳
address: Uncle Lu Restaurant, 3779 Sexsmith Rd, Richmond, BC V6X 1J8, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: 柚經典萬巒豬腳飯 / Wan Luan Pork Hock Rice Meal
hasMenuItem.description: 经典豬腳飯可選配白飯,湯麵,拌麵線,湯麵線 / Pork Hock Meal Can Choose from Rice, Noodle Soup, Sesame Oil Vermicelli or Vermicelli Soup

hasMenuItem.name: 萬巒豬腳 / Wanluan Pork Hock
hasMenuItem.description: Wanluan pork hock, available in small or large.

hasMenuItem.name: 招牌滷肉飯 / Braised Pork w/ Egg on Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Braised pork belly served over rice, accompanied by a braised egg, typically includes a savory soy-based sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 炸鹹酥雞 / Deep-fried Chicken Nuggets
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy chicken nuggets, marinated with a blend of spices and deep-fried, often served with a hint of five-spice for that classic Taiwanese flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: 紅燒牛肉湯麵 / Beef Noodle Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Wheat noodles served in a rich broth, accompanied by tender slices of beef and typically includes seasonal vegetables and a hint of soy sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 客家小炒 / Stir-fried Hakka Style Sauce with Pork
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried in traditional Hakka style, this dish features tender pork slices mixed with a unique sauce and a variety of vegetables, often including celery and spices.

hasMenuItem.name: 滷豆干 / Marinated Dried Tofu
hasMenuItem.description: Dried tofu marinated in a savory blend of soy sauce and spices, often accompanied by a hint of sesame oil and green onion.

hasMenuItem.name: 由台式三杯雞 / Chicken with Three Spice Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried chicken in a traditional Taiwanese sauce made from equal parts soy sauce, sesame oil, and rice wine, typically includes basil and ginger.

hasMenuItem.name: B彰化肉圓 / Taiwanese Meat Ball Dumpling
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed dumpling filled with a savory mix of minced meat, typically enveloped in a soft, slightly chewy wrapper, a classic Taiwanese snack.

hasMenuItem.name: 梅干薯條 / Deep-fried Sweet Potato Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried sweet potato fries, typically served with a hint of salt to enhance their natural sweetness.

hasMenuItem.name: 燙青菜 / Seasonal Veg. Minced Pork Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Blanched seasonal vegetables topped with a savory minced pork sauce, typically including hints of garlic and soy.

hasMenuItem.name: 三杯豬腳 / Pork Hock with Three Spice Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Pork hock simmered in a sauce crafted from a trio of spices, typically including soy sauce, rice wine, and sesame oil.

hasMenuItem.name: 柚經典萬巒豬腳飯 / Wan Luan Pork Hock Rice Meal
hasMenuItem.description: 经典豬腳飯可選配白飯,湯麵,拌麵線,湯麵線 / Pork Hock Meal Can Choose from Rice, Noodle Soup, Sesame Oil Vermicelli or Vermicelli Soup

hasMenuItem.name: 萬巒豬腳 / Wanluan Pork Hock
hasMenuItem.description: Wanluan pork hock, available in small or large.

hasMenuItem.name: 三杯豬腳 / Pork Hock with Three Spice Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Pork hock simmered in a sauce crafted from a trio of spices, typically including soy sauce, rice wine, and sesame oil.

hasMenuItem.name: 士林香腸 / Taiwanese Style Pork Sausage
hasMenuItem.description: Juicy pork sausage slices paired with fresh garlic cloves and garnished with cilantro.

hasMenuItem.name: 招牌滷肉飯 / Braised Pork w/ Egg on Rice
hasMenuItem.description: Braised pork belly served over rice, accompanied by a braised egg, typically includes a savory soy-based sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: B彰化肉圓 / Taiwanese Meat Ball Dumpling
hasMenuItem.description: Steamed dumpling filled with a savory mix of minced meat, typically enveloped in a soft, slightly chewy wrapper, a classic Taiwanese snack.

hasMenuItem.name: 炸鹹酥雞 / Deep-fried Chicken Nuggets
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy chicken nuggets, marinated with a blend of spices and deep-fried, often served with a hint of five-spice for that classic Taiwanese flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: 梅干薯條 / Deep-fried Sweet Potato Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried sweet potato fries, typically served with a hint of salt to enhance their natural sweetness.

hasMenuItem.name: 炸水餃(8 pcs) / Deep-fried Dumpling
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy dumplings filled with a savory mixture, typically pork, encased in a golden-brown shell.

hasMenuItem.name: 炸墨魚甜不辣 / Deep-fried cuttlefish cake
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried cuttlefish cake, typically includes a savory blend of minced cuttlefish formed into cakes, coated in batter, and deep-fried until golden.

hasMenuItem.name: 酥炸四季豆 / Deep-fried Green Beans
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried green beans, often accompanied by a light seasoning of salt and perhaps a hint of garlic for added flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: 海帶結 / Marinated Seaweed
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated seaweed, typically presented as a salad, combines seaweed with a blend of sesame seeds and a light, savory dressing.

hasMenuItem.name: 百頁豆腐 / Marinated Soybean Tofu
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated soybean tofu, also known as 百頁豆腐, is tofu intricately layered, typically marinated in a blend of soy sauce and spices.

hasMenuItem.name: 滷大腸 / Marinated Pork Intestine
hasMenuItem.description: Marinated pork intestine, traditionally prepared with a blend of spices and sauces for a rich and savory taste.

hasMenuItem.name: 滷豆干 / Marinated Dried Tofu
hasMenuItem.description: Dried tofu marinated in a savory blend of soy sauce and spices, often accompanied by a hint of sesame oil and green onion.

hasMenuItem.name: 五香滷蛋 / Marinated Egg
hasMenuItem.description: Hard-boiled eggs marinated in a savory blend of soy sauce and traditional five-spice seasoning.

hasMenuItem.name: 紅燒牛肉湯麵 / Beef Noodle Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Wheat noodles served in a rich broth, accompanied by tender slices of beef and typically includes seasonal vegetables and a hint of soy sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 清湯麵 / Plain Noodle Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Simple noodle soup prepared with a clear broth and served with traditional Chinese noodles.

hasMenuItem.name: 台南擔仔面 / Soup with Meat Sauce n Egg
hasMenuItem.description: 台南擔仔面, or Tainan-style noodle soup, features egg noodles in a rich broth, typically topped with a savory meat sauce and a softly cooked egg.

hasMenuItem.name: 滷肉拌陽春麵 / Braised Pork Sauce w/ Dry Noodle
hasMenuItem.description: Dry noodles tossed with a savory braised pork sauce, typically includes a mix of herbs and spices for depth of flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: 紅燒牛肉湯麵(無肉) / Beef Noodle Soup (No Beef)
hasMenuItem.description: House-made noodles in a savory broth, typically includes vegetables and traditional Chinese seasonings, offering the essence of beef noodle soup without the beef.

hasMenuItem.name: 鹹酥雞乾麵 / Deep-fried Chicken Nuggets w/ Dry Noodles
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried chicken nuggets paired with dry noodles, typically includes a mix of seasoning and sauces to enhance the flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: 鹹酥雞湯麵 / Deep-fried Chicken Nuggets Noodles Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried chicken nuggets and noodles served in a savory broth, typically includes vegetables and seasonings to complement the crispy chicken.

hasMenuItem.name: 燙青菜 / Seasonal Veg. Minced Pork Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Blanched seasonal vegetables topped with a savory minced pork sauce, typically including hints of garlic and soy.

hasMenuItem.name: 鲜炒高麗菜 / Stir-fried Taiwan Cabbage
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried Taiwan cabbage is quickly tossed over high heat with garlic, often accompanied by subtle hints of ginger and a light soy sauce glaze.

hasMenuItem.name: 櫻花蝦炒高麗菜 / Stir-fried Taiwan Cabbage w/ dried shrimps
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried crisp Taiwan cabbage with savory dried shrimps, typically includes garlic and a hint of soy sauce for flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: 培根高麗菜 / Stir-fried Taiwan Cabbage w/ Bacon
hasMenuItem.description: Taiwan cabbage stir-fried with slices of bacon, offering a blend of crisp vegetable textures and the smoky taste of bacon.

hasMenuSection.name: 迷你火鍋 / Mini Hot pot

hasMenuItem.name: 酸菜白肉鍋 / Sour Cabbage Soup with Pork Hotpot
hasMenuItem.description: Sour cabbage and pork in a steaming broth. Choice of rice, vermicelli, or noodles for sides.

hasMenuItem.name: 韓式泡菜鍋(牛肉/豬肉) / Korean Kimchi Hotpot (Beef/Pork)
hasMenuItem.description: Korean Kimchi Hot Pot featuring choice of beef or pork. Served with options of rice, vermicelli, or noodles.

hasMenuItem.name: 台式麻油雞(含2小菜) / Sesame Oil n Cooking wine Chicken Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Sesame oil chicken soup, choice of rice, vermicelli, or noodles. Served with 2 small side dishes.

hasMenuItem.name: 番茄牛五花/豬五花 / Tomato Beef/Pork Hot pot
hasMenuItem.description: Tomato-based broth with choice of beef or pork. Served with rice, vermicelli, or noodles.

hasMenuItem.name: 鳳梨苦瓜雞湯(含2小菜) / Pineapple n Bitter gourd Chicken Soup
hasMenuItem.description: Pineapple and bitter gourd chicken soup hot pot with a choice of rice, vermicelli, or noodles. Includes two side dishes.

hasMenuSection.name: 經典熱炒 / Stir-fried Dish - 雞肉類 / Chicken

hasMenuItem.name: 由台式三杯雞 / Chicken with Three Spice Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried chicken in a traditional Taiwanese sauce made from equal parts soy sauce, sesame oil, and rice wine, typically includes basil and ginger.

hasMenuItem.name: 宮保雞丁 / Kung Pao Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Diced chicken stir-fried with peanuts, chili peppers, and vegetables, typically bell peppers and onions, in a spicy kung pao sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 鮮果糖醋雞丁 / Sweet N Sour Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Battered chicken balls, typically including bell peppers, pineapple, and onions, tossed in a tangy sweet and sour sauce.

hasMenuSection.name: 經典熱炒 / Stir-fried Dish - 豬肉/牛肉類 / Pork/Beef

hasMenuItem.name: 客家小炒 / Stir-fried Hakka Style Sauce with Pork
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried in traditional Hakka style, this dish features tender pork slices mixed with a unique sauce and a variety of vegetables, often including celery and spices.

hasMenuItem.name: 三杯肥腸 / Pork Intestine with Three Spice Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Pork intestines stir-fried with a savory blend of sesame oil, soy sauce, and rice wine, typically accompanied by basil and ginger.

hasMenuItem.name: 魚香茄子肥腸煲 / Eggplant with Pork Intestine In Hotpot
hasMenuItem.description: Eggplant and pork intestine cooked together in a hotpot, typically seasoned with a blend of spices for a rich and aromatic experience.

hasMenuItem.name: 爆炒雙蔥牛肉 / Stir-fried Beef w/ Green Onion
hasMenuItem.description: Tender sliced beef stir-fried with both green and white parts of spring onions, typically in a savory soy sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 宮保肥腸 / Kung Pao Pork Intestine
hasMenuItem.description: Pork intestine stir-fried with peanuts, chili peppers, and a special spicy Kung Pao sauce, typically includes green onions.

hasMenuItem.name: 椒鹽四季肥腸 / Salt & Pepper Pork Intestine with Green Beans
hasMenuItem.description: Salt and pepper pork intestines stir-fried with green beans, typically seasoned with garlic and a hint of chili for a savory touch.

hasMenuSection.name: 經典熱炒 / Stir-fried Dish - 海鮮類 / Seafood

hasMenuItem.name: 糖醋鱸魚 / Sweet & Sour Bass
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried sea bass, accompanied by bell peppers and onions, typically includes a tangy sweet and sour sauce.

hasMenuSection.name: 經典熱炒 / Stir-fried Dish - 青菜類 / 豆腐 / Vegetable/Tofu

hasMenuItem.name: 魚香茄子 / Eggplant with Pork in Hotpot
hasMenuItem.description: Eggplant and minced pork cooked together in a savory sauce, served in a hotpot, embodying the traditional "fish-fragrant" flavor profile without containing fish.

hasMenuItem.name: 三杯杏鮑菇 / Abalone Mushroom with Three Spice Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Abalone mushrooms stir-fried with a savory blend of sesame oil, soy sauce, and rice wine, typically featuring hints of ginger and basil.

hasMenuItem.name: 七味椒鹽豆腐 / Salt & Pepper Deep-fried Tofu
hasMenuItem.description: Deep-fried tofu seasoned with a blend of seven spices, including salt and pepper, offering a savory and slightly spicy taste profile.
